DataElement.preferredName: HIV Status And Lymph Node Involvement Status Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine the grouping of items based on the human immunodeficiency virus result and the finding indicating whether or not cancer has spread to regional or distant lymph node(s).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: HIV Status And Lymph Node Involvement Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The result of testing to determine if an individual is infected with the human immunodeficiency virus._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A finding indicating the spread of cancer to regional or distant lymph node(s)._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The result of testing to determine if an individual is infected with the human immunodeficiency virus.

Concepts.definition: The result of testing to determine if an individual is infected with the human immunodeficiency virus.

ValueDomain.preferredName: HIV Status Lymph Node Involvement Category
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

PermissibleValues.value: HIV-positive or HIV-negative with possible lymph node involvement
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Positive Or Human Immunodeficiency Virus Negative With Possible Lymph Node Involvement

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Positive Or Human Immunodeficiency Virus Negative With Possible Lymph Node Involvement
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A laboratory test result indicating the presence of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) in a sample.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Indicates that human immunodeficiency virus has not been detected in a sample.: Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.: Capable of happening or occurring.: A finding indicating the spread of cancer to regional or distant lymph node(s).

Concepts.definition: A laboratory test result indicating the presence of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) in a sample.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Indicates that human immunodeficiency virus has not been detected in a sample.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
A finding indicating the spread of cancer to regional or distant lymph node(s).

PermissibleValues.value: HIV-negative with no lymph node involvement
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Negative No Lymph Node Involvement

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Negative No Lymph Node Involvement
